fields.name: BillingPeriod
fields.description: Billing Period in YearMonth(e.g. 202008) format. Only for legacy enterprise customers can use this. Can only have one of either timePeriod or invoiceId or billingPeriod parameters. If none provided current month cost is provided.

fields.name: CustomerId
fields.description: Customer Id for Modern (Invoice Id and billing profile is also required for this).

fields.name: InvoiceId
fields.description: Invoice Id for PayAsYouGo customers and Modern billing profile scope. Can only have one of either timePeriod or invoiceId or billingPeriod parameters. If none provided current month cost is provided.

fields.name: Metric
fields.description: The type of the detailed report. By default ActualCost is provided

fields.name: TimePeriod
fields.description: Has time period for pulling data for the cost detailed report. Can only have one of either timePeriod or invoiceId or billingPeriod parameters. If none provided current month cost is provided.
